conference.title: AHEAD 2025 International Conference
conference.tagline: Global Disruptions in Healthcare and Development: Challenges, Innovations, and Pathways for the 21st Century
conference.description: Annual international hybrid conference hosted at IIT Roorkee, focusing on global challenges and innovations in healthcare and development. Addresses health system inefficiencies, mental health, malnutrition, climate crises, and more. In India, health expenditure is 3.8% of GDP, with 39.4% out-of-pocket and 60% uninsured. Globally, 50% lack essential health services.

tracks.name: Health Risk and Financing
tracks.description: Focuses on managing health and financial risks, emphasizing universal health coverage.

tracks.name: Occupational Health
tracks.description: Addresses worker well-being, productivity, and workplace safety policies.

tracks.name: Climate Change and Environmental Governance
tracks.description: Explores health risks from climate change and sustainable policies.

tracks.name: Health Behavior and Cognition
tracks.description: Focuses on economic dimensions of health behavior for resilient systems.

tracks.name: Gender, Health Inequities, and Care Injustice
tracks.description: Examines gender inequalities in healthcare and policy reforms.

tracks.name: Aging, Health, and Wellness
tracks.description: Addresses economic and social implications of aging.
sub_themes: Social Support and ICT in Aging

tracks.name: Efficiency and Performance in Healthcare
tracks.description: Optimizes healthcare resource use and service delivery.

tracks.name: Economics, Nutrition, and Human Capital

tracks.name: Health Systems and Technological Disruptions

tracks.name: Education, Labour, and Informal Enterprises
